TopicTitle: tab constantly saying theirs new content.

Articles.Content:
i keep two tabs of this forum open on my browser at all times, one that i actually use for posting, and the other i keep open for guides/deltav map.

before whenever their was a new reply to one of my topics, or somebody mentioned me/quoted me their would be a blue tick on the tab, and when i checked the notification the tick would go away.

now the tick is almost always their, it confuses me because i come back from work and i think somebody has replied to my topic to help me with a problem and really it was nothing.
Our IT person is working on some bugs right now.
